thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 12 of 523
thread.title: Jenna Maack

author: Jenna Maack
title: Jenna Maack
text: I think Fabletics has a great things going - as indicated above I have loved every item I've purchased, and think the prices are reasonable especially considering how well they fit and the amazing fabrics (soft, lux feeling). The only negatives I would mention are that I found the membership details such as using a credit versus purchasing an item at a discount, confusing. Additionally, the shipping is very slow, and I wish they had more variety in the pants department, as almost all of the pants are tight, skinny style; while that is a style I enjoy, I play disc golf often and wish there were more options for that type of exercise (e.g, Adidas-style pants that are warm for outdoor activities, maybe a lightweight waterproof pant, and/or pants with a wider bottom). I do enjoy fabletics overall and would recommend them to a friend!
